data.title: Factbox: How social media services handle political ads
data.text: Online platforms including Facebook and Alphabet Inc's  Google face growing pressure to stop carrying political ads that contain false or misleading claims ahead of the U.S. presidential election.

data.title: Twitter accuses Tories of misleading public with 'factcheck' foray
data.text: Dominic Raab defends rebranding account during debate and adds: ‘no one gives a toss’

data.title: Britain's ruling political party masqueraded as a fact-checker on Twitter during a TV debate
data.text: Twitter called the stunt an attempt to "mislead" people, adding that any similar actions in the future would result in "decisive corrective action."
